record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, there will now be a period for the transaction of morning business until 2:45 p.m., with Senators permitted to speak therein, with the first half controlled by the majority leader or his designee and the second half controlled by the minority leader or his designee.
record.narrative: (The remarks of Mr. Casey pertaining to the submission of S. Res. 166 are located in today's Record under "Submission of Concurrent and Senate Resolutions.")
